languages.text: "Мы видим потенциал для большой беды. Она уже зреет и может, как волна, обрушиться на простор Коронус — а может, и выйти за его пределы. Грядут страдания и смерть".
"We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."
languages.original_text: "Мы видим потенциал для большой беды. Она уже зреет и может, как волна, обрушиться на простор Коронус — а может, и выйти за его пределы. Грядут страдания и смерть".

traits.locale_text: "We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."
"We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."
"We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."
"We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."
"We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."

languages.text: 「大災害の可能性が見える。すでに機は熟している。波がコロヌス・エクスパンスを襲い、そしてもしかすると、さらにその先にまで広がっていくかもしれない。我々は苦痛と死へ向かっている」
languages.original_text: "We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."

traits.locale_text: 「大災害の可能性が見える。すでに機は熟している。波がコロヌス・エクスパンスを襲い、そしてもしかすると、さらにその先にまで広がっていくかもしれない。我々は苦痛と死へ向かっている」

languages.text: “我们看到了可能发生的浩劫。它已酝酿成熟，狂暴的海啸会冲击整个科罗努斯扩区，或许还会蔓延到扩区之外。此时此刻，我们正在走向痛苦与死亡。”
languages.original_text: "We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."

traits.locale_text: “我们看到了可能发生的浩劫。它已酝酿成熟，狂暴的海啸会冲击整个科罗努斯扩区，或许还会蔓延到扩区之外。此时此刻，我们正在走向痛苦与死亡。”

languages.text: "Wir sehen das Potenzial für eine gewaltige Katastrophe. Sie reift bereits heran. Die Welle könnte über die Koronus-Ausdehnung hereinbrechen und sich vielleicht sogar darüber hinaus ergießen. Wir steuern auf Leid und Tod zu."
languages.original_text: "We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sehen das Potenzial für eine gewaltige Katastrophe. Sie reift bereits heran. Die Welle könnte über die Koronus-Ausdehnung hereinbrechen und sich vielleicht sogar darüber hinaus ergießen. Wir steuern auf Leid und Tod zu."

languages.text: « Un grand désastre se prépare. Nous le percevons. Il pourrait déferler sur les Étendues de Koronus et peut-être même s'étendre au-delà. Nous courons droit vers la souffrance et la mort. »
languages.original_text: "We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."

traits.locale_text: « Un grand désastre se prépare. Nous le percevons. Il pourrait déferler sur les Étendues de Koronus et peut-être même s'étendre au-delà. Nous courons droit vers la souffrance et la mort. »

languages.text: «Vemos el potencial de una gran catástrofe. Ya está en ciernes; es una ola que podría abatirse sobre la Extensión de Koronus, y tal vez incluso propagarse más allá de sus fronteras. Nos aguardan tiempos de sufrimiento y muerte».
languages.original_text: "We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."

traits.locale_text: «Vemos el potencial de una gran catástrofe. Ya está en ciernes; es una ola que podría abatirse sobre la Extensión de Koronus, y tal vez incluso propagarse más allá de sus fronteras. Nos aguardan tiempos de sufrimiento y muerte».

languages.text: "Korkunç bir felaket ihtimalini görüyoruz. Olgunlaşıyor... Dalga, Koronus Enginliği'ne çarpabilir ve hatta ötesine geçebilir. Izdırap ve ölüme doğru yol alıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "We see the potential for a great disaster. It is already ripening. The wave could crash down upon the Koronus Expanse and, perhaps, extend beyond it. We are headed for suffering and death."

traits.locale_text: "Korkunç bir felaket ihtimalini görüyoruz. Olgunlaşıyor... Dalgalar Koronus Enginliği'ne çarpabilir ve hatta ötesine geçebilir. Izdırap ve ölüme doğru yol alıyoruz."
